oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On the Hausdorf Dimension of Minimal Interval Exchange Transformations with Flips
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Skripchenko, Alexandra
Troubetzkoy, Serge
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Dynamical Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We prove linear upper and lower bounds for the Hausdorff dimension set of minimal interval exchange transformations with flips (in particular without periodic points), and a linear lower bound for the Hausdorff dimension of the set of non-uniquely ergodic minimal interval exchange transformations with flips.
